first_para: Sir Richard Geoffrey James Ottaway (born 24 May 1945) is a British Conservative politician, Member of Parliament for Croydon South from 1992 to 2015. He was previously MP for Nottingham North (1983–87).

full.extract:
Sir Richard Geoffrey James Ottaway (born 24 May 1945) is a British Conservative politician, Member of Parliament for Croydon South from 1992 to 2015. He was previously MP for Nottingham North (1983–87).
^ "House of Commons - The Register of Members' Financial Interests - Part 2: Part 2". Publications.parliament.uk. Retrieved 29 January 2014.
full.title: Richard Ottaway
